fields.summary: reuseAddress option should be used for child channels in Portmap and SimpleTcpServer

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

fields.description:
Bind can fail in SimpleTCPServer & Portmap because socket is in TIME_WAIT state.

Socket options should be changed here to use the setReuseAddress option.

{noformat}

fields.summary: Fix bind failure in SimpleTCPServer & Portmap where bind fails because socket is in TIME_WAIT state
